title: 支払い 2
description: 飲食店でお会計をするシーンです。顧客はクレジットカードでの支払いを希望します。

steps.description: まずは伝票を渡し、中身を確認してもらおう
steps.hint: Here is your bill. Please take your time to review it.

steps.description: 次に支払い方法を確認しよう
steps.hint: How would you like to settle the payment?

steps.description: クレジットカードで支払う場合、カードを渡してもらおう
steps.hint: May I have your credit card, please?

steps.description: 支払いが完了したことを伝え、レシートを渡そう
steps.hint: Your payment has been successfully processed. Here is your receipt. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
